com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block
Class NeighborChest

java.lang.Object
  com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.NeighborChest

public class NeighborChest
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the second part of a double chest, the first one being a CreeperChest.

Author:
nitnelave
